description: ABSOLUTE SHOWSTOPPER at Harbour Place Estates! Tastefully renovated and turn key ready! Step inside to a fully renovated chef's kitchen with newer high end appliances, solid cabinetry, modern backsplash and a farmhouse sink that overlooks your open concept and sun-filled living/dinning room combo. Step outside to your professionally manicured backyard oasis that requires no maintenance: Just sit back and relax all year around - Multiple covered areas that includes a retractable pergola and a high end wooden pergola. Step up to the bright and sun filled second floor to 3 generous bedrooms. Primary bedroom has a large ensuite bathroom with skylight and a walk out balcony perfect for your morning coffee! 2 Other bedrooms have a balcony for fresh air! Pride of ownership!
